name: 13-node-express-handlebars
description: Instructions for use (after cloning repo)1 1. npm init  2. 'npm i express express-handlebars express-session mysql2 sequelize'  3. 'npm install --save-dev sequelize-cli' 4. 'npm install --save path' 5. Install nodemon (if already have globally installed) use: 'npm install --save-dev nodemon' 6. Run nodemon then open on localhost and order some drinks!
